resources.string:
GitUtil provides a touch-optimized web interface for managing git repositories on Android devices via Termux.

Features:
• Browse commit history
• Rollback branches to any commit
• Touch-friendly interface
• Works offline

Requirements:
• Termux (from F-Droid only)
• Git, Bash, and Python 3
• Web browser

Install packages in Termux:
pkg install git bash python
